name: Health Yoga Class
shortDes: An Integrated and systematic approach to yoga has a positive effect on holistic health. This includes physiological, mental, emotional, social as well as spiritual wellbeing. Health Yoga is most effective in dealing with psychosomatic problems.

name: Prenatal Yoga
shortDes: Prenatal yoga is a form of gentle yoga that is designed to complement the growing needs of a pregnant body during all three trimesters. The focus is on restorative poses that keep you safe while practicing movement, stretching, deep breathing, and mental centering.

name: Power Yoga Class
shortDes: Power Yoga is a beginner-friendly, elective style of HATHA Yoga with scientific base to help you out. It has legacy of ancient traditions including Asana, Pranayama, and yogic cleaning procedure.

name: Corporate Yoga
shortDes: It is the art of freeing a corporate man so that he/she is motivated, creative and energized.

name: Kids Yoga
shortDes: By practicing yoga poses, children can learn how to exercise, develop confidence, and concentrate better.

name: Dynamic Meditation
shortDes: Meditation is a powerful technique from ancient India. Meditation is one of the most powerful tools
